title: Where Can I Travel in the Caribbean Without a...
text:
Question: Where Can I Travel in the Caribbean Without a Passport? 
Answer: 
If you are a U.S. citizen, you may travel to Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands without a passport, since these islands are part of the United States. All other destinations require you to have a U.S. passport or U.S. Passport Card to travel.
